sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Protection of Dogs and Cats from Unnecessary Testing Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Protection of Dogs and Cats from Unnecessary Testing Act.

sections.heading: Prohibition on the use of dogs or cats in toxicological experiments; exemptions; enforcement.
sections.text: Prohibition on the use of dogs or cats in toxicological experiments; exemptions; enforcement.

sections.heading: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.
sections.text: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
